name: TetheCat Bridged USDT
description: USDT.c is designed to provide secure and efficient cross-chain interaction, allowing users to easily move liquidity between blockchain networks. USDT Bridged TC20 is a fully secured stablecoin, pegged 1:1 to USDT, with multi-blockchain support via a bridge based on the TC20 standard for fast and cheap transactions in DeFi. USDT.c is a fully collateralized stablecoin pegged to the USDT and running on the TC20 standard. The token is deployed within the TetheCat ecosystem and is backed by USDT reserves in a 1:1 ratio, stored in regulated custodial accounts.
